phrases.english: The priest speaks to the people during the ___.
phrases.portuguese: O padre fala com as pessoas durante a missa.

phrases.english: The colorful ___ show scenes from the Bible.
phrases.portuguese: Os vitrais coloridos mostram cenas da Bíblia.

phrases.english: People sit on a ___ during the service.
phrases.portuguese: As pessoas sentam em um banco durante a cerimônia.

phrases.english: The large ___ rings when the mass begins.
phrases.portuguese: O grande sino toca quando a missa começa.
